instruction: Set up a more consistent schedule with the patient's daughter to help manage the doses of furosemide.

attributes.comment: Set up a more consistent schedule with the patient's daughter to help manage the doses of furosemide.

instruction: Patient took an extra dose of furosemide yesterday, felt dizzy afterward. Feeling a bit better today but still not quite right. No changes in weight or swelling observed.

attributes.narrative: Patient took an extra dose of furosemide yesterday, felt dizzy afterward. Feeling a bit better today but still not quite right. No changes in weight or swelling observed.
